meanings.definition: The quality or state of being original.
meanings.sent1: Her painting showed great originality in its unique style.
meanings.sent2: His originality in coming up with new ideas impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's originality in jokes always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The writer's originality shone through in her fresh perspective on the topic.
meanings.sent5: The singer's originality on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The ability to think or act independently and creatively.
meanings.sent1: His originality in problem-solving set him apart from his peers.
meanings.sent2: The artist's originality in creating new designs was admired by many.
meanings.sent3: The student's originality in answering questions surprised the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The chef's originality in combining flavors resulted in a unique dish.
meanings.sent5: The inventor's originality in creating useful gadgets was well-known.

meanings.definition: The quality of being new and unique.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer's originality in clothing designs was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: The company's originality in product development led to its success.
meanings.sent3: The child's originality in storytelling entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The architect's originality in building designs won awards.
meanings.sent5: The musician's originality in composing music touched many hearts.
